links.title: Audi targets 10 billion euros in cost cuts to fund electric-car push: sources

links.title: Amazon and Wal-Mart Finally Give Hydrogen Power a Reason to Be
links.description: Andy Marsh sees his future -- and it's forklifts. His tiny company, , makes hydrogen fuel cells, and for years he struggled to find customers. No longer. In April, agreed to try out the technology in forklift fleets at 10 of its warehouses.
